mapper.insert: insert into qna (userid, qnasubject, qnacontent, hit, regtime) values (#{userid}, #{qnasubject}, #{qnacontent}, 0, now())
insert into qnareply (replycontent, userid, replydate, qnano) values (#{replycontent}, #{userid}, now(), #{qnano})
mapper.select: select qnareplyno, userid, replycontent, qnano, replydate, case when date_format(replydate, '%Y%m%d') = date_format(now(), '%Y%m%d') then date_format(replydate, '%H:%i:%s') else date_format(replydate, '%y.%m.%d') end replydate from qnareply where qnano = #{qnano} order by qnareplyno desc
